name: Frappe
description: Frappe with Vanilla Ice Cream is a Greek invention of a cold instant coffee mixed in high speed electric shaker machine and in the end served with a big scoop of Ice Cream. Perfect for the warm days of summer.
directions: Take a tall glass of water and add the 1 1/2 teaspoon of Instant Coffee.
Add tap water until it just covers the coffee and sugar.
Take an electric shaker and mix it for 15 seconds.
Add the Ice Cubes up to the top of the glass.
Add the water up to the top of the glass (leave 1 finger empty).
Drop the scoop of Vanilla Ice Cream
